title.narrative: Inception phase on new police cooperation between GPI and SPA 2021
Inception phase on new police cooperation between GPI and SPA 2021

description.narrative:
Den Svenska Polismyndigheten har ansökt Sida om finansiering på 3 955 000 SEK för att genomföra genomförbarhetsfasprojekt för utveckling av ett nytt samarbetsprogram med den Moldaviska Polismyndigheten under juli 2021 - april 2022.
Insatsen syftar till att 1) identifiera omfattningen av ett nytt potentiellt program med beaktande av de resultat som uppnåtts och lärdomarna från det föregående programmet och 2) konkret definiera "vad" det ska uppnås med det nya programmet och "hur" genom att utveckla ett konkret projektförslag.
Insatsens totala budget är 3 955 000 SEK fullständigt täckt av Sida.

The Swedish Police Authority has applied to Sida for funding of 3 955 000 SEK to carry out the Feasibility Phase Project for development a new cooperation programme with the Moldovan Police Authority during July 2021- April 2022.
The intervention aims at 1) identifying the scope of a new potential programme, considering the results achieved and lessons learned from the previous programme and 2) defining in concrete terms "what" is to be achieved by the new programme and "how" by developing a concrete project proposal.
The intervention’s total budget is 3 955 000 SEK fully covered by Sida.

This is a short term feasibility phase type intervention. The main objective is to support the Swedish Police Authority (SPA) to develop a project proposal to continue its cooperation with the Moldovan Police Authority. In 2017-2021 Sweden supported the first assistance project for the Moldovan Police implemented by SPA. The feasibility phase will allow SPA to identify and assess the needs that could be further addressed and to define the terms and conditions for a new project based on results achieved and lessons learned in 2017-2021. The result expected is a project proposal fully developed and submitted by SPA to the Embassy in Chisinau by April 2022.
